MS MCQs

    Automate the deployment of ARM templates by using GitHub Actions

    »

    1. When you’re using linked templates, where can you store the linked artifacts?

      On a networked server accessible over SMB.

      On any endpoint that’s publicly accessible through HTTP or HTTPS.

      On any endpoint that’s publicly accessible through FTP.


    2. When you’re deploying a template through GitHub Actions, you must provide authentication credentials in what form?

      Provide a username and template as part of a configured secret in GitHub repository settings.

      Use the user credentials part of a configured secret in GitHub repository settings.

      Provide the shared access signature (SAS) part of a configured secret in GitHub repository settings.


    3. What’s the best way to modularize your resources for deployment?

      Use nested templates.

      Use linked templates.

      Use GitHub Actions to control the deployment.
